last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 3
last_episode_to_air.overview: Gavin's personal quest for the truth nears its conclusion, forcing Peter to face a dark secret from his past that sheds a disturbing light on his love for Prue. As the net begins to close, the Mansons are forced to acknowledge a truth that could destroy their lives for ever.

name: Bouquet of Barbed Wire
overview: Bouquet of Barbed Wire explores the consequences of a father’s obsessive love for his daughter and how secrets once buried in the past return to haunt their lives. Trevor Eve plays Peter Manson, whose apparently successful life is turned upside down when his beloved teenage daughter Prue reveals she’s pregnant by her teacher, Gavin Sorenson. The very heart of the family is threatened as Peter has an intuitive sense that Gavin’s on a personal quest for revenge.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In episode one the lives of Peter and Cassie Manson are turned upside down when their beloved daughter Prue reveals that she is pregnant by her teacher, Gavin Sorenson. Prue plans to keep the baby, drop out of school and marry Gavin. Besides Peter’s aching fear that he has lost his daughter forever, he is rocked by the unnerving certainty that Gavin is on a personal mission against him. Is this just fatherly concern, or has Peter’s love for Prue become an obsession?

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Peter is worried that he has lost his daughter for ever and believes that Gavin is on a personal mission against him.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Gavin's personal quest for the truth nears its conclusion, forcing Peter to face a dark secret from his past that sheds a disturbing light on his love for Prue. As the net begins to close, the Mansons are forced to acknowledge a truth that could destroy their lives for ever.
